JUDGES: Jon Fridrik Kjølbro;Julia Laffranque;Nebojša Vučinić;Stéphanie Mourou-Vikström;Georges Ravarani
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are NORP nationals , who were both born in DATE . The first applicant , Mr ORG , was detained in the Bolu F - type prison and the second applicant , PERSON , was detained in the PERSON prison when the present applications were lodged .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Bolu prison disciplinary board decided to withhold the first applicant ’s letter addressed to ORG in GPE on the ground that the letter contained defamatory statements . The disciplinary board based its decision on DATE ( CARDINAL ) of PERSON no . CARDINAL on the execution of sentences and preventive measures .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Bolu Enforcement Judge dismissed the applicant ’s objection . Subsequently , on CARDINAL DATE ORG dismissed a further appeal lodged by the applicant .

CARDINAL . On DATE the PERSON prison disciplinary board decided to withhold the second applicant ’s letter addressed to a journalist , on the ground that the letter contained statements praising a terrorist organisation ( ORG ) and its leader . The disciplinary board based its decision on LAW no . DATE on the execution of sentences and preventive measures and LAW on prison management and execution of sentences .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Kırıkkale Enforcement Judge dismissed the applicant ’s objection , and on DATE ORG dismissed a further appeal lodged by the applicant .
CARDINAL . A full description of the domestic law and practice at the relevant time may be found in PERSON v. GPE ( ( dec . ) , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
